Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'If we want to go to the control center next, we need to take the main passage. But...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Darn. That AI shut the airtight valve...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "All terminals nearby are covered in that thick, black matter. We don't have enough firepower to force open this airtight valve...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'I knew it was you... Leave immediately.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Watanabe? If we can receive his comms, he must be not far away...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'A large howling sound travels all the way from the other end of the passage.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Bullets and explosions start to blast the airtight valve.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Watanabe is piloting an aircraft... in the passageway...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Tsk. Didn't manage to destroy it completely.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Watanabe opens his cockpit. He glances at Gray Raven and jumps off.'}
{3: 'The next moment, his aircraft collides with the valve, causing a fiery explosion behind.'}
{3: 'While Watanabe lands on the ground without a scratch...'}
